name: The Adventures of Bob (Overflux Studios, AbundantNoise)
name_original: The Adventures of Bob (Overflux Studios, AbundantNoise)
description:
The Adventures of Bob

Welcome to a world of infinity. You play as Bob, an alien who has come to a strange planet and ends up stuck in the sky. 

THE GAME IS PACKAGED INTO A .EXE FILE WITH NSIS FOR EASE OF INSTALL

This game was made for the November Game Jam hosted by OrangeScientist1 with the theme of 'The Ground Moves'.

It was made in Unity and programmed in C#
